questionTitle: Mother's Day is the day when children show their ................ to their mothers.
Mary is ...................... She'd like a piece of bread.
Does she usually have a party .................. her birthday?
Mary asked her mother ................... her more about the fairy story.
At seven o'clock last night I ................... to the radio.
I haven't had ................... an enjoyable evening for months.
I'm really longing ................... the Tet holidays.
She was ................... clever that she could make a dress by hands.
What time did you arrive ................ London?
Nam hasn't finished ................... yet.
There is a post office ..................... the end of the road.
The librarian told the students not ................... reference books out of the library.
My sister is afraid ............... monkeys in the zoo.
It's very dark here. I can't ................... anything.
He's just arrived ................ New Delhi airport.
This film is .......... than the one we saw last week.
Milk is used for ................... many products.
Most of the pupils are ................... to pass the examination.
They said they were very ................ in natural beauty.
My mother won't come home ............. 10 p.m.
